byline: Bruce Johnson and Stacey Vanek Smith
teaser: Diana Adams, a tech entrepreneur and consultant who has been on Twitter since it’s early days, joins us to talk about thinking strategically for first tweets. Plus, Marketplace reporter David Gura joins us for this week's Silicon Tally.
description: Diana Adams, a tech entrepreneur and consultant who has been on Twitter since it’s early days, joins us to talk about thinking strategically for first tweets. Plus, Marketplace reporter David Gura joins us for this week's Silicon Tally.
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, March 21, 2014
